description: Generates a statblock for an NPC.

input_variables.name: game_system
input_variables.description: The TTRPG game system for which the statblock is designed.

input_variables.name: npc_outline
input_variables.description: A description of the NPC for which a statblock is to be generated.

input_variables.name: npc_challenge_rating
input_variables.description: The challenge rating of the NPC.
